actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to declare that certain federally owned land is held by the United States in trust for the United Sioux Tribes of South Dakota Development Corporation.

summary.text: Declares that specified federally owned land in South Dakota is held by the United States in trust for the United Sioux Tribes of South Dakota Development Corporation.

titles.title: A bill to declare that certain federally owned land is held by the United States in trust for the United Sioux Tribes of South Dakota Development Corporation.
